item.title: Node :: Upgrading npm
item.description: Is there a quicker way of just updating all the dependencies, including major version changes? So, like npm update but for major version updates as well? Yes, there is a tool called npm-check-updates that will do this. Just run the following command: npx npm-check-updates -u This will update the dependencies to the latest versions (including major version changes) in the package.json file.
